title: Internal compiler error (traits & associated consts)

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-stable
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from one stable version to another.
